Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is lightly covered with a light-brown deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and very faint traces of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394280) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394280)
